Name: Touhou: Fading Illusion
About the game: Touhou: Fading Illusion is a visual novel set in Touhou Project universe that comprehensively describes Gensokyo and its inhabitants. Get ready to meet many of the series' iconic characters and travel to various locations in the Underworld, Gensokyo, Heaven, and even Outside World! Synopsis: They say curiosity killed the cat, but Yukari Yakumo didn't seem to know the saying. Her little experiment with the Hakurei Barrier had consequences that the youkai world was not prepared for. Gensokyo is shaken by a series of small and seemingly unrelated incidents, and eight groups of youkai and humans set out for investigation. None of them suspects what their actions might result in. Game Features: 8 unique chapters that show events from different perspectives and complement the story. Currently you can read the prologue. Choices in one chapter affect choices in another. Completely different stories on repeat playthroughs! Over 50 characters from Touhou Project series. Journey through the vast world of Touhou Project! Visit the Former Hell, Netherworld, various parts of Gensokyo and even beyond!
